data.author: Kubru Technology, LLC

changelog.release_notes:
v1.0 Initial release of Health Metrics watchface with the following features: 
- Displays the time in large font in 24-hour or 12-hour format 
- Displays day and date beneath the time 
- Battery meter with red low battery indication 
- Bluetooth disconnected indication 
- Displays steps, calories expended, distance (in miles or kilometers), and active time
- White watchface for white and pink watches

data.description: All your daily activity statistics in one glance without any button pushing.
